name: Pony GO (itch)
description:
What is Pony Go?

We started Pony Go in a Game Jam weekend as a tribute to Pokemon Blue & Red, Pokemon Go and MLP. Our few players were excited with what we did in two days, so we thought it would be nice to create a full game.

You can play on your mobile phone, but it's designed to be played without need of Internet connection.

This is a non-official game. Not related with Hasbro or any company.
